00086 inline void CTubePolylineShape::SetOrientationVisible(bool state)
00087 {
00088        if (m_isOrientationVisible != state){
00089               m_isOrientationVisible = state;
00090               Invalidate(iview::CS_CONSOLE);
00091        }
